description: This warming beef stew is a one pot meal with hearty butternut squash and potatoes.
name: Beef & Butternut Squash Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.8 cups beef stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube
500g butternut squash, peeled, deseeded and chopped into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large, deep casserole and cook the beef in batches for 2 minutes on each side to brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the remaining oil, onions and celery to the casserole and cook for 5-6 minutes. Add the beef back into the pan with its juices.
Add the rosemary, beef stock, bay leaves, butternut squash and potatoes and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove the lid and cook uncovered for 20 minutes to reduce the sauce. Remove the rosemary and bay leaves and serve.
